1 Prerequisites

To run this project, you need the following:
* Eclipse 3.1m6 
* aspectJ-1.2m3
* JRE 1.5.0_02
* Compiler compliance level: 5.0
* Set up EMF_CORE user library (see below)

1.1 EMF_CORE user library

* java>build path>user libraries
* EMF_CORE
* org.eclipse,emf.ecore_2.0.1/runtime/ ecore.jar, ecore.resources.jar
* org.eclipse,emf.common_2.0.1/runtime/ common.jar, common.resources.jar

1 Compiling
Should auto-build by itself; if have problems, try removing and then re-adding the AspectJ nature (from package explorer)
